title: Hervé Oussalé
text:
Hervé Oussalé (born 16 June 1988 in <a href="Tyialo">Tyialo</a>) is a <a href="Burkina%20Faso">Burkinabé</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who is currently <a href="Free%20agent">unattached</a>.
Career.
Oussalé began his career with Les Etalons Juniors, then joined the juniors from <a href="Etoile%20Filante%20Ouagadougou">Etoile Filante Ouagadougou</a> where he played until July 2006. In July 2006, he moved to <a href="FC%20Brussels">FC Brussels</a> in Belgium where he played for the juniors for 18 months and was scouted by <a href="FC%20Red%20Bull%20Salzburg">FC Red Bull Salzburg</a> where he played in the reserve team. He left after six months and returned to Burkina Faso, signing a contract with <a href="Etoile%20Filante%20de%20Ouagadougou">Etoile Filante de Ouagadougou</a>.
On 30 January 2009, he left <a href="Etoile%20Filante%20de%20Ouagadougou">Etoile Filante de Ouagadougou</a> in the <a href="Burkinab%C3%A9%20Premier%20League">Burkinabé Premier League</a> to join <a href="Alemannia%20Aachen">Alemannia Aachen</a> in the <a href="2.%20Bundesliga">2. Bundesliga</a>. Oussalé gave his debut on 6 February 2009 against <a href="FC%20Hansa%20Rostock">FC Hansa Rostock</a>. After one year, he left <a href="Alemannia%20Aachen">Alemannia Aachen</a> and returned to <a href="Belgium">Belgium</a>, signing on for <a href="RAEC%20Mons">RAEC Mons</a> on 8 January 2010.
He was invited to have a trial with <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.">Persepolis</a> in the summer of 2010 and scored two goals in a friendly match. He joined <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.">Persepolis</a> in July 2010.
On 6 July 2011, Oussalé signed an 18-month contract with <a href="Algeria">Algeria</a>n club <a href="MC%20Alger">MC Alger</a>. He made his debut for the club on 16 July 2011, as a starter in a <a href="2011%20CAF%20Champions%20League%20group%20stage">2011 CAF Champions League group stage</a> match against <a href="Tunisia">Tunisia</a>n side <a href="Esp%C3%A9rance%20Sportive%20de%20Tunis">Espérance</a>.
International career.
Oussalé has played with the U-17 from Burkina Faso in the qualifications for the Coupe d’Afrique des Nations Cadets 2005 in <a href="Gambia">Gambia</a> and was promoted in 2006 to the Senior National Team.
